Author: beautifulchaos22
Text: Haha I’m glad you got a little laugh out of it 😭😜 I’m sorry that you’re feeling similarly as well, but it’s definitely nice to know I’m not alone!   Thank you so much! All the best to you, I hope you have a lovely day!  Hugs back! ❤️

Author: coconuthead00
Text: this genuinely me laugh a little because I have been the SAME exact disordered shithead too and gone through the i-want-to-be-weighed-but-also-dont cycle so I really relate. at the same time, it’s also really heartbreaking all we put ourselves through. i hope recovery goes really well for you- you deserve it. sending hugs <3
